prompts: Create a small fire-type Pokemon with a bright orange body and a fiery tail.
Imagine a playful Charmander with a mischievous grin and vibrant colors.
Design a Pokemon that resembles Charmander but with unique flame patterns on its back.
Generate a cute fire-type creature that loves to play in the mountains and fields.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with scales that change color based on its emotions.
Give me a detailed description of a baby dragon-like Pokemon with a love for adventure.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire, featuring a bright red and yellow color scheme.
